cards.name: Bullseye
cards.ability: Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.

cards.name: Doom 2099
cards.ability: End of Turn: Add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

cards.name: Green Goblin
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

cards.name: Marvel Boy
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

cards.name: Mirage
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the character that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.

cards.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
cards.ability: After an enemy character is played here, destroy it. (once per game)

cards.name: The Thing
cards.evolved: On Reveal: Afflict 3 enemy cards here with -1 Power.

cards.name: Zabu
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

cards.name: Jennifer Kale
cards.ability: Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

cards.name: Viv Vision
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give each card in your hand +1 Power if you’re winning here. Otherwise, move this to another location.

cards.name: Air-Walker
cards.ability: When this is destroyed, replace it with a 4-Cost card from your hand or deck.

cards.name: Frankie Raye
cards.ability: After the next time you play a 6-Cost card, double this card's Power.

cards.name: Galactus: First Steps
cards.ability: My Herald is the next character I see you play. End of Turn: +3 Power if you're winning my Herald's location. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Super-Adaptoid
cards.ability: On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Activate card here.

cards.name: Danger
cards.ability: Activate: Destroy an enemy card here with less Power.

cards.name: Karima Shapandar Omega Sentinel
cards.ability: Activate: Afflict the highest-Power enemy card with -7 Power.

cards.name: Awesome Andy
cards.ability: Activate: Give one of your cards at each other location +2 Power.

cards.name: Sparky
cards.ability: Activate: Give your card that last moved +2 Power and move it back to its previous location.

cards.name: Jocasta
cards.ability: Activate: Immediately Activate your other cards here. (without using up their Activate abilities)

cards.name: Warlock
cards.ability: Activate: For each unspent Energy, give a card in your hand -1 Cost.

cards.name: Jim Hammond Human Torch
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, +1 Power for each bonus Energy you have.

cards.name: Bastion
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add copies of your other cards here to your hand. Set their Costs to 2 and Power to 3.

cards.name: Moira X
cards.ability: When this is destroyed, get a copy of your opening hand.

cards.name: Headpool
cards.ability: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand then give cards there +1 Power.

locations.name: Rocket Pad
locations.ability: After turn 4, give cards on the winning side here +1 Power.

items.title: Grand Arena
items: Choose your Champion from a roster of eight iconic characters, then battle using unique decks and powerful skill cards tailored to each hero. Mole Man and Mad Thinker will be available as rewards during the event!

items.name: Zabu
changes: 1/2 – On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

items.name: Bullseye
changes: 3/3 – Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.

items.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
changes: 3/3 – After an enemy card is played here, destroy it. (once per game)
3/3 – After an enemy character is played here, destroy it. (once per game)

items.name: Mirage
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Copy the card that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.
2/3 – On Reveal: Copy the character that costs the least from your opponent’s hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.

items.name: Marvel Boy
changes: 3/1 – End of turn: Give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

items.name: Jennifer Kale
changes: 2/2 – Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

items.name: Doctor Doom 2099
changes: 4/3 End of Turn: Add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.
